sentences.en: A new generation of scientists became fascinated by dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 新一代科学家对恐龙研究着了迷。

sentences.en: a new range of drugs
sentences.cn: 一系列新药

sentences.en: a young man with new ideas
sentences.cn: 一个有新观念的年轻人

sentences.en: He is always eager for new experiences and ever-willing to experiment.
sentences.cn: 他总是渴望拥有新的经历，而且永远愿意尝试。

sentences.en: He succeeded with the aid of a completely new method he discovered.
sentences.cn: 借助于自己发现的一种全新的方法，他获得了成功。

sentences.en: His instinct would be to seek a new accommodation with the nationalists.
sentences.cn: 他本能的反应会是寻求与民族主义者取得新的和解。

sentences.en: How do you like your new diet?
sentences.cn: 你认为你的新的饮食怎么样？

sentences.en: I like the new dress.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这件新连衣裙。

sentences.en: I spent lots of money on smart new outfits for work.
sentences.cn: 我花大笔钱购置了上班时穿的漂亮新套装。

sentences.en: I'm always pleased to try out a new variety.
sentences.cn: 我一直乐于尝试新产品。

sentences.en: its separate vapour tank was &B{a new one on me}.
sentences.cn: 它的隔离蒸气箱是我前所未知的。

sentences.en: Julian has been thinking up new ways of raising money.
sentences.cn: 朱利安想出了不少筹款的新办法。

sentences.en: New $750,000 infomercials, featuring artists like Cher, have recently hit the screens.
sentences.cn: 耗资75万美元、有雪儿等艺人出镜的新的名人电视促销节目近来播出了。

sentences.en: New Japanese cars averaged 13 km to the litre in 1981.
sentences.cn: 1981年，新型的日产汽车平均每升汽油能跑13千米。

sentences.en: new products on the market
sentences.cn: 市场上的新产品

sentences.en: New ways to treat arthritis may provide an alternative to painkillers.
sentences.cn: 关节炎的新疗法可能是止痛药之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: She was afraid in a way that was quite new to her.
sentences.cn: 她感到从未有过的害怕。

sentences.en: the city’s new hospital
sentences.cn: 市里新建的医院

sentences.en: The hardest part of this job is understanding the new technology.
sentences.cn: 这项工作最难的地方是理解新技术。

sentences.en: the new issue of ‘Time’ magazine
sentences.cn: 新一期《时代周刊》

sentences.en: The new shopping centre was constructed at a cost of 1.1 million.
sentences.cn: 新建成的购物中心耗资110万。

sentences.en: The new system is still in the planning stages.
sentences.cn: 新体系仍处于规划阶段。

sentences.en: The new town would have been unrecognisable to the original inhabitants.
sentences.cn: 原来的居民可能会认不出这个崭新的城镇了。

sentences.en: The programme of sell-offs has been implemented by the new chief executive.
sentences.cn: 新任总裁已经执行了抛售方案。

sentences.en: United were unlucky … so what's new?.
sentences.cn: 联队时运不佳…还能怎样？。

sentences.en: What do you think our new house should be like ?
sentences.cn: 你认为我们的新房子应当是什么样子的？

phrases.tran_cn: 新世界（指西半球或南、北美洲及其附近岛屿）
n. 元旦（等于New Year's Day）；除夕（等于New Year's Eve）

trans.tran_cn: 新的，崭新的，新鲜的，新到的，现代的，初次（听到）的
trans.tran_en: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

trans.tran_cn: 新的，新近的；新来的；不熟悉的
trans.tran_en: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc
